extends Object
    This class is used to interact with the plugin API

      • isPartOfMob

        public static boolean isPartOfMob(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity e)
        Use this method to find out if an entity is part of a mob (ArmorStands / anchor mob) Note pets are also considered to be mobs
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Is the entity part of a mob

        Use this method to find out if an entity is part of a pet (ArmorStands / anchor mob)

        Returns:

      • getMobID

        public static int getMobID(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity e)
        Use this method to get the mob ID of a mob Note this is also the pet ID
        Parameters:
        e - The entity we want to get the id from
        Returns:
        The mob id (If the entity is not part of a mob this method will return -1)

      • getMob

        public static Mob getMob(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity e)
        Returns a mob from a living entity
        Parameters:
        e - The entity we want to get the mob from
        Returns:
        The mob (If this entity is not part of a mob this method will return null)

      • getPet

        public static Pet getPet(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity e)
        Returns a pet from a living entity
        Parameters:
        e - The entity we want to get the pet from
        Returns:
        The pet (If this entity is not part of a pet this method will return null)

      • loadContainer

        public static MobContainer loadContainer(File file)
        Use this method to load a mob container from .mpet file
        Parameters:
        file - The mpet file we want to load from
        Returns:
        The result mob container (If anytype of error occurs this will return null)

      • isValidPetName

        public static boolean isValidPetName(String newName)
        Use this method to determine if a string contains banned words
        Parameters:
        newName - the string being tested
        Returns:
        true if the supplied string contains no blocked words
